name: ios26-foundation-models
description: Expert iOS 26 development with Foundation Models, HealthKit State of Mind, Swift Charts, and StoreKit 2
author: Claude & Andy

examples.prompt: Create a Foundation Models classification service
examples.description: Generates a complete classification service using @Generable and LanguageModelSession

examples.prompt: Add HealthKit State of Mind tracking
examples.description: Implements State of Mind API with proper iOS 18+ availability checks
Creates subscription manager with product loading, purchase flow, and entitlement checks
Implements data visualization with BarMark, LineMark, and PointMark
Resolves actor isolation, Sendable, and MainActor problems
